trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown
There were no other sightings in Levittown on or around June 24th 2009
Summary: Stays in 1 spot then moves 10 degrees off center.
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been watching this object for over 6 months, it appears almost directly overhead stays motion less for up to 2 minutes then makes odd patterns in sky, zips around it's orginal location and then stops dead before movement starts it flickers but does not appear now to be moving towards earth but is in between jupiter and mars. it is a bright white light much like a star but the movements are being made by something. I have tried every photographic method at my disposable but the light is so faint that nothing can pick it up yet it is clearly visable with the naked eye.nasa, air force both say they don't see it but that's impossible because myself + neighbors have parties watching it do it's thing. THIS IS AN U F O WITHOUT QUESTION
